Package mindustry.logic

Class LStatement

java.lang.Object
mindustry.logic.LStatement
Direct Known Subclasses:
LStatements.CommentStatement, LStatements.ControlStatement, LStatements.DrawFlushStatement, LStatements.DrawStatement, LStatements.EndStatement, LStatements.GetLinkStatement, LStatements.InvalidStatement, LStatements.JumpStatement, LStatements.OperationStatement, LStatements.PrintFlushStatement, LStatements.PrintStatement, LStatements.RadarStatement, LStatements.ReadStatement, LStatements.SensorStatement, LStatements.SetStatement, LStatements.UnitBindStatement, LStatements.UnitControlStatement, LStatements.UnitLocateStatement, LStatements.WriteStatement
public abstract class LStatement
extends java.lang.Object
A statement is an intermediate representation of an instruction, to be used mostly in UI. Contains all relevant variable information.
